answers.answer: I wouldn't worry about it, although I got my results right after but I only took the one hour test. But most doctors offices don't call unless they find something wrong. Call them if you want. Where's the rule book that we have to wait to find out information about ourselves and our babies? Lol right? I would go ahead and call them if it is driving you nuts. An explain it is driving you nuts an you would like to know the results. Chances are high that you are not the only not the first person to ever do it.
Calm down. They don't tell you right away. You know results take days to go back to your doctor
They'll probably tell you tomorrow at your appointment. There's not point them tonight if your going tomorrow anyway

Well I did the 3 hr blood draw a week ago they told me that day it take 1-2 days. To know the results. But I think they should have called with the results good or bad once they had them just out of respect

question: So tomorrow I have an appointment and they have not called me to tell me the results of the 3 hr blood draw. How should I prepare myself I'd they tell me I have gestational diabetes. I'm kind if nervous. I've already started eating healthier and stuff. By dietitian talked to me about all the stuff I will have to cintone to do if I have it. My fiance doesn't think I have it but I think I do because it's on both sides of my family. Why else would my sugar be high. When we did the 1 hr glucose test. I mean I don't want gd but im not gonna pretend There's not a chance that I don't have it when There's a chance that I might have it.
title: doctor hasnt called me yet??
